main event: Observers sighted a cigar-shaped object resembling white smoke moving westward for approximately 15 minutes before it disintegrated.
interesting points: The object was first noted in a vertical position before turning horizontally and elongating., It was observed from about 15 miles away., The object had no sound or odor., No visible trail was left by the object during its flight., The incident occurred under clear weather conditions with unlimited visibility.
witness description: The witness was seated in the rear of an automobile traveling west on Highway 80.
